tgt_original: 見佛欲於無熱池中，共諸苾芻各說往昔因業。 即於池中，化出大蓮花，其花千葉，猶如車輪，色如天金，寶莖花蘂金剛所作，無量千花周匝圍遶。

src_original: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputro gṛdhrakūṭe parvate saṃghāṭīṃ sivāyamānas tiṣṭhati /

src_original: evam bhagavann ity āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavato vacanam pratiśrutyānavatapte mahāsarasy antarhitaḥ /  gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthād āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya purastād evaṃ cāha /
tgt_original: 」白言： 」時具壽大目揵連，從無熱池沒，於祇利跋窶山現，到舍利弗前告言： 「具壽舍利弗！

src_original: he śāriputra śāstā ta ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdham anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāmas tvām udīkṣaṇaparas tiṣṭhati  āgacchatāṃ gacchāvaḥ /

src_original: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana saṃghāṭīṃ tāvat sīvyāmi paścād āgamiṣyāmi /  āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evaṃ saṃghāṭīsūtrā bhavatu /

src_original: āyuṣmañ chāriputra yadi na yāsyasi saṃghāṭī tāvat sīvayitavyaḥ /  tataḥ paścād yāsyasi /  āyuṣmañ chāriputra sāhāyyaṃ kalpayāmi /

tgt_original: 勿為是事，非但財寶散失，我等俱亡。

src_original: sa tena śaktiprahāreṇa ghātita iti /
tgt_original: 其伴商主，見不從諫，即持利槍刺之令死。

src_original: tat kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ /
tgt_original: 汝等苾芻，於意云何？

src_original: yo 'sau sārthavāho yena śaktiprahāreṇa praghātitaḥ /  aham eva tena kālena tena samayena yat tan mayā śaktiprahāreṇa praghātitaḥ /
tgt_original: 往昔之時刺殺他者，豈異人乎？ 我今即是。

src_original: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣūpapannaḥ /
tgt_original: 由斯業故，經於多歲、百歲、千歲中，墮地獄中，受諸楚毒。

src_original: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitānīti vistaraḥ /
tgt_original: 「諸苾芻！ 如來往昔自作斯業，廣說乃至頌曰：

src_original: yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ /
tgt_original: 『果報還自受。

src_original: aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān /
tgt_original: 「乃往古昔，人壽八萬歲時，有佛世尊，號毘鉢尸如來、應、正等覺，出現於世。

src_original: vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacanena dvau bhrātarau pravrajitau babhūvatur vasiṣṭho bharadvājas ca /
tgt_original: 其佛有二弟： 一名皤私瑟吒、二名跋羅陀皤闍。

src_original: vasiṣṭheṇa sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ /
tgt_original: 其皤私瑟吒，於佛教誨專勤修習而不放逸，證阿羅漢果。

src_original: bharadvājenāpi paṭhatā svādhyāyatā trīṇi piṭakāny adhītāni /  tripiṭakaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
tgt_original: 其跋羅陀皤闍，受持三藏，諷誦通利，為大法師。

src_original: tena gṛhapatir anvāvartitaḥ /  tena tam uddiśya sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannavihāraḥ kāritaḥ /  tena tasya bhrātuḥ samvṛttam āgaccaikadhye vāsaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 後於異時，有一長者，於法師處深生淨信，為其法師建一住處，所須資具悉皆嚴備。 時法師啟請皤私瑟吒羅漢，願來同住。

src_original: sa tatra gataḥ tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: 彼聞即至。

src_original: arhad bhikṣuḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca dṛṣṭvābhiprasannaḥ /  sa tena prasādajātena pūjayitvā mahārheṇa ca vastreṇācchāditaḥ /
tgt_original: 長者見其身心寂然儀容挺特，倍加淨信，嚴辦種種香美飲食而以供養，持上妙衣用為奉施。

src_original: visphuradvicitramarīcijāla ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ lohitapakṣaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ parivṛto guratmān iva vihāyasā jetavanād vihārān  ekonapañcaśatavītarāgeṇa sārdhaṃ gatavān / 17  atha bhagavān mahāśrāvakasaṃghena saha śrāvastyām antarhitaḥ himavaduttarasthagandhamādanaparvatasyottareṇa mahākīṭaparvatasyāgre  'navatapte mahāsarasi pratyasthāt / 18
tgt_original: 佛共四百九十九苾芻眾，於室羅伐城沒，無熱池邊出，往詣野猛藥叉遊行之處，其處花果甚可悅意。
